title: Patterns and disparities in indoor particulate matter levels in selected primary schools in Kigali, Rwanda
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Noel Korukire, Ana Godson, Judith Mukamurigo, Akanbi Oyiza Memunat, Josias Izabayo, David Bashaija, Theoneste Ntakirutimana
